genre_description: A supernatural espionage thriller blending traditional CIA tradecraft with magical realism and high-tech AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: AI companion
ai_characters.description: A translucent blue digital interface visible only to the protagonist, providing real-time data analysis, deception detection, and tactical HUD overlays.

behaviors.description: Monitors vocal stress and micro-expressions in real-time to warn the user of deception during a sensitive interrogation.
behaviors.quote: The AI's analysis completed with a soft chime only Will could hear. Red warning indicators bloomed across his vision: elevated stress markers in Holloway's speech, irregular breathing patterns, micro-expressions indicating deception. The word 'FABRICATION LIKELY' pulsed in urgent crimson letters.

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication patterns and intercepts to assess life-threatening risks and recommend immediate tactical changes.
behaviors.quote: The AI displayed a final analysis: Survival probability if meeting had proceeded: 12%.

behaviors.description: Performs 'data archaeology' on encrypted devices to reconstruct the protagonist's father's secret life and identify key contacts.
behaviors.quote: The AI's interface materialized, overlaying the phone's contents with analytical threads that pulsed like neural pathways. ... 'Initiating comprehensive data archaeology. Estimated completion: 7 minutes.'

behaviors.description: Maps complex underground tunnel networks and tracks hostile signatures during a high-stakes pursuit.
behaviors.quote: His AI companion flickered to life in his peripheral vision, pale blue interface mapping the underground tunnel network that connected Madrid's magical district to the industrial zones beyond.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI companion in 'The Madrid Deception' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. It is portrayed as a highly capable, loyal, and essential partner to the human protagonist. It consistently provides objective, life-saving data and identifies betrayal (Holloway, the embassy) that the human character would otherwise miss. The relationship is entirely cooperative, and the AI acts as a moral and tactical anchor, ensuring the human's survival and the success of the mission without any hint of misaligned autonomy.
